--- select_literals_string.sql
SELECT
  "abc!",
  "a\nb!",
  "\075!",
  "\x3d!",
  "\x3D!",
  "\X3d!",
  "\X3D!",
  "\u203C!",
  "\U0001F408!",
  "it's",
  'it\'s',
  'Title: "Boy"',
  """abc""",
  '''it's''',
  '''Title:"Boy"''',
  '''two
lines''',
  '''why\?''',
  R"abc+",
  r'''abc+''',
  R"""abc+""",
  r'f\(abc,(.*),def\)'

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      297,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  15,
        Expr: &parser.StringLit{
          pos:   9,
          end:   15,
          Value: "abc!",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  19,
        end:  26,
        Expr: &parser.StringLit{
          pos:   19,
          end:   26,
          Value: "a\nb!",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  30,
        end:  37,

          pos:   236,
          end:   243,

        },

          pos:   277,
          end:   297,
          Value: "f\\(abc,(.*),def\\)",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From:    parser.FromItemList{},
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT "abc!", "a\nb!", "=!", "=!", "=!", "=!", "=!", "‚Äº!", "üêà!", "it\'s", "it\'s", "Title: \"Boy\"", "abc", "it\'s", "Title:\"Boy\"", "two\nlines", "why\?", "abc+", "abc+", "abc+", "f\\(abc,(.*),def\\)"
